Package Levels

Class GameLevel

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.World
Levels.GameLevel
Direct Known Subclasses:
Level1, Level2, Level3, Level4
public abstract class GameLevel
extends city.cs.engine.World

Superclass for all levels extending the World that enables motion and interactions to be simulated in the game.

  • Field Summary

      public abstract org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 startPosition()

      Abstract function that will pass the starting position of the character body specified in each level class

      Returns:
      vector with given components i.e. the x and y coordinate of the player body

    • portalPosition

      public abstract org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 portalPosition()

      Abstract function that will pass the portal position specified in each level class

      Returns:
      vector with given components i.e. the x and y coordinate of the portal body

    • isCompleted

      public abstract boolean isCompleted()

      Abstract function that will determine if the level has been completed as a boolean value

      Returns:
      Will return true if the player has collected the specified number of keys in the current level

    • stopMusic

      public abstract void stopMusic()
